column8: she was the daughter of the late joseph and jessie macomber grab. she was married 37 years to clyde b. metzler. in her earlier years
column9: jeanine worked at the former rca
column10: lancaster. she was a member of st. joan of arc roman catholic church
column11: hershey. surviving in addition to her husband is a sister
column12: audrey wife of james r. hecht of manheim and three nephews. a mass of christian burial will be held at st. richard catholic church
column16: 2015 at 11:00 am. interment will be private. there will be a public viewing from 10:30 am until the time of mass.
